Coffee filters can be used as a funnel when pouring liquids into a narrow opening.
Coffee filters can be used as a paper towel substitute for cleaning small spills or wiping down surfaces.
Coffee filters can be used as a protective layer when painting or working with chemicals to prevent spills or splatters.
Coffee filters can be used as a natural insecticide by placing them in the soil around plants to trap pests.
Coffee filters can be used as a plant food source by adding coffee grounds to the soil.
